column2: OVERVIEW:     The Sr Software Engineer will be the primary UI/UX developer for a Business automation team developing infrastructure, application and business automation software as part of a digital transformation effort for a SaaS cloud hosting organization. This Engineer should be a highly motivated, customer obsessed Software Development Engineer who specializes in creating engaging and seamless software. One of the main objectives for this Engineer will be to develop software that is aesthetically pleasing, easy to navigate and just makes sense in order to maximize adoption of the automation platforms across the business. This individual will work within the business automation team along with several senior automation and application developers in concert with application and infrastructure automation teams in project squads that are specifically aligned to create solutions for customers that meet their requirements and maximize solution adoption.      The ideal candidate for this role will have 5 years of experience in software development focused on the end user experience but with a broad full stack development skillset. This candidate will have experience working in agile and devops methodologies and working with team members across the organization to achieve customer desired outcomes.      OPPORTUNITY HIGHLIGHTS:       Serve as the UI/UX developer on a business automation development squad, providing guidance, knowledge sharing and pair programming in working with a team of developers through a digital transformation effort for our SaaS cloud operations organization.          Work within and across teams to develop user interfaces, applications and systems integrations that are first and foremost focused on the customer needs, elegant in their simplicity and rugged, yet don t over extend themselves unnecessarily.          Knowledge of professional software engineering best practices for the full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing and operations.          Experience working within DevOps teams is highly desired.          Integrating a user interface and business automation platforms with various automation and orchestration systems and various other services via RESTful APIs, python based APIs and more, resulting in a seamless customer experience that looks and feels the same regardless of the background workflows and actions invoked.         Integration with key business systems, reporting and big data analytics platforms including SQL databases, CRMs, and Splunk to provide a consolidated view and portal for automated self service operations providing environment visibility and transparency         Translate concepts into user flows, wireframes, mockups and prototypes that lead to intuitive user experiences         Continuously solicit/review user feedback on past efforts to refine and evolve experiences       SKILLS & QUALIFICATIONS:     Required:       5 years experience in Software development         Top Priority Skillsets: HTML, CSS, javascript, ReactJS         Medium Priority Skillsets: ASP.net & MVC         MedLow Priority Skillsets: RDBMS and event management         Low Priority Skillset: Python         Proficiency in writing SQL queries for use within applications and automation.         Experience using REST APIs and performing systems integrations with new and existing platforms         Demonstrated experience solving problems with innovative solutions.         Strong accountability & ownership for activities and deliverables         Excellent communication skills.         Strong technical troubleshooting skillset         Experienced in working as part of a team for software development/automation purposes such as an agile team or squad.         Experience creating functional design documents, technical design documents, interviewing end users to create user stories, and translating those into finished projects       Preferred:       Experience working on an Automation platform (ansible, salt stack, vrealize automation & orchestration)         Proficiency with XML, JSON and SOAP protocols including serialization and deserialization of related data         General infrastructure background and understanding       EDUCATION, TRAINING AND MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS       Bachelor s degree, preferably Computer Science or Engineering discipline.

column2: An RPA Blue Prism Developer is a professional who specializes in designing, developing, and implementing Robotic Process Automation (RPA) solutions using the Blue Prism platform      RPA technology enables the automation of repetitive and rule-based tasks by using software robots or "bots" to interact with various applications, systems, and databases      As an RPA Blue Prism Developer, your main responsibilities may include:      Requirement Gathering and Analysis: Collaborating with business analysts and stakeholders to understand the process requirements that are suitable for automation      Identifying opportunities for automation and evaluating the feasibility of implementing RPA solutions      Solution Design: Designing and developing the RPA solution architecture using Blue Prism      Creating detailed process flowcharts, decision trees, and documentation to guide the development and implementation phases      Bot Development: Building and configuring software robots using the Blue Prism platform      This involves creating process workflows, defining business logic, developing automation scripts, and integrating with various applications and systems      Testing and Debugging: Conducting thorough testing of the RPA solutions to ensure accuracy, reliability, and efficiency      Identifying and resolving any issues or errors that arise during the testing phase      Performing debugging and troubleshooting activities to optimize bot performance      Deployment and Implementation: Deploying the developed bots into the production environment      Coordinating with system administrators and IT teams to ensure the smooth integration of the RPA solution with existing systems and infrastructure

column2: Position:   WEB DESIGNER Job Type: Full Time CTC Package: ?As Per Company Job Description: Dsoft Infotech?is hiring?a well-groomed, talented, and creative Web Designer to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a passion for design, creativity, and a keen eye for detail. As a Web Designer, you will be responsible for creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites that meet our needs and requirements. Primary Roles and Responsibilities: Designing engaging and responsive websites. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and objectives. Translating requirements into design solutions. Creating wire-frames, mock-ups, and prototypes to present design concepts. Developing custom graphics, icons, and other visual elements. Ensuring website design is optimized for maximum speed and scalability. Testing website functionality across various browsers and devices. Maintaining and updating existing websites as needed. Staying up to date with the latest design trends, techniques, and technologies. Skills Required: 2+ years work experience as a web designer or similar role. Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript etc. Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, or Sketch. Good knowledge regarding UI & UX design. Experience with responsive and mobile-first design principles. Team spirit and collaboration skills. Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Attention to detail and a high level of accuracy. Portfolio showcasing previous web design projects. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree OR certificate in Web Design, Graphic Design, or related field (preferred). Job Location:  Ahmedabad / Rajkot Company Culture:   Our Team comprises motivated individuals that help each other to do remarkable things every day. We face challenges together and we win together. And just like other humans, we make mistakes, but we learn from them quickly. Company   Brief: With a rich history spanning 35 years, Dsoft Infotech Pvt Ltd has been a leading provider of world-class innovative solutions to prominent jewelry industry in India and overseas. Distinguished for its commitment to excellence, Dsoft has been instrumental in delivering top-notch ERP software products, namely ORNATE, meticulously designed to meet the unique demands of the retail jewelry industry and PROFIT NX for accounting solutions. In addition to its flagship offerings, Dsoft boasts a diversified portfolio through its sister concern, Dsoft Innovations LLP. The subsidiary owns FREEDEEM, a local commerce app that has made a significant impact in the market. The latest addition to Dsoft's impressive lineup is SUVARNA SETU, a personalized mobile app platform tailored exclusively for jewelers. The company is well known in the jewellery segment for its brand ??ORNATE. ORNATE addresses all the basic requirements of retail and wholesale jewelers. ORNATE has the highest market share in the country with more than 5000 jewelers using the different solutions in 23 states of the country. Some of the leading jewellers of the country are using ORNATE range of solutions. The company has head office at Rajkot and branch office at Ahmedabad with the total employee strength of 50+ people. Dsoft remains at the forefront of the industry, continuously adapting to the evolving needs of jewelry businesses and leveraging technology to redefine the future. For more details: www.ornatesoftware.com?/www.profitnx.com?/ www.freedeem.in

Experience -  2 years to 4 years Saivion India: Job UI and Web Designer  Job UI Web Designer Position for Sr. UI Web Designer Wed Jul 19 2017     Required skillset:  Good designing and color sense,  HTML CSS,  Wordpress,  JavaScript,  Basic Photo Editing,  A Desire to Learn. Responsive Web Design,  Version Control,  Web Performance.   Description:  Looking for creative and talented Web Designer who can handle all design related work like Website UX/ UI design. We are looking for a senior user experience designer with strong interests and expert capabilities in the website design and development of engaging user experiences. The ideal candidate will thrive in a work environment that requires strong issues- solving skills and independent self- direction,  coupled with an aptitude for team collaboration and open communication. This position requires someone who is passionate about Web design,  our company policies allow you to play around and experiment with new several things.   Send an email with your resume/ background/ experience to info@saivionindia.com with the subject line Sr. UI Web Designer.  Alternatively,  you can also fill up this form and we'll get back to you.     Second Floor,  Aggarwal Arcade Plot  Number 8,  Secotor- 5,  Rohini  New Delhi -  110085 INDIA    info@saivionindia.

column2: We are looking for a user-experience (UX) designer to be able to understand our requirements of all digital products and projects of WVS and any technical limitations, as well as be responsible for conceiving and conducting user research, interviews and surveys, and translating them into sitemaps, user flows, customer journey maps, wireframes, mockups and prototypes. The UX lead will also be expected to design the overall functionality of the products, and in order to ensure a great user experience, iterate upon it in accordance with user-testing. The UX lead will lead a small team of 2 to 3 members and will be in-charge of UX for all digital assets       Responsibilities :           Translate concepts into user flows, wireframes, mockups and prototypes that lead to intuitive user experiences     Facilitate the vision of WVS by researching, conceiving, sketching, prototyping and user-testing experiences for its digital products     Design and deliver wireframes, user stories, user journeys, and mockups optimized for a wide range of devices and interfaces     Identify design problems and devise elegant solutions.     Make strategic design and user-experience decisions related to core, and new, functions and features     Take a user-centered design approach and rapidly test and iterate your designs.     Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders         Requirements :           Eight or more years of UX design experience. Preference will be given to candidates who have experience designing complex solutions for complete digital environments and track record of leading teams     Expertise in standard UX software such as Sketch, Figma, XD, OmniGraffle, Axure, InVision, UXPin, Balsamiq, Framer, and the like is a must. Basic HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript skills are a plus     Ability to work with clients to understand detailed requirements and design complete user experiences that meet client needs and vision     Extensive experience in using UX design best practices to design solutions, and a deep understanding of mobile-first and responsive design     A solid grasp of user-centered design (UCD), planning and conducting user research, user testing, A/B testing, rapid prototyping, heuristic analysis, usability and accessibility concerns     Ability to iterate designs and solutions efficiently and intelligently.     Ability to clearly and effectively communicate design processes, ideas, and solutions to teams and clients     A clear understanding of the importance of user-centered design and design thinking     Ability to work effectively in a team setting including synthesizing abstract ideas into concrete design implications     Be excited about collaborating and communicating closely with teams and other stakeholders via a distributed model, to regularly deliver design solutions for approval     Be passionate about resolving user pain points through great design     Be open to receiving feedback and constructive criticism     Be passionate about all things UX and other areas of design and innovation. Research and showcase knowledge in the industrys latest trends and technologies
column11: Ux Design, Invision, User Stories, User Experience, Sketch, Prototyping, User Research, Axure, User - Centered Design

column2: Job Overview     We are looking for a Web Designer who strives to deliver an exceptional look, feel and specialized portrayal of a client s business through his knowledge of website designing.     You should create a unique brand identity for our client s business. As a Web Designer, you should believe in sustainable designing solutions with the best aesthetics.     You should be talented enough to produce web design which is par with the content. You should have the skills to represent the client s business objectives with powerful web design.     If you can make responsive web designs that are user-friendly and highly customized with structured information, we would like to meet you.     Responsibilities       Undertake designing assignments entirely from the stage of conception to the final completion.         Bring visual concepts that are catchy and appealing to the client or design agency.         Build user-friendly designs to simplify the complex processes.         Create clear storyboards, process flows and sitemaps to make it easier for the client.         Conduct design presentations in the presence of all the stakeholders including the management executives as well as the client.         Identify the technical problem by testing the web pages.         Give suggestions and guidance for the designers responsible for layout, styles, and color for the user interface design.         Coordinate with the design team and web developers.         Optimize the existing site for maximum scalability and speed.         Create a website that is effective and appealing for the best user experiences.         Track the latest trends and techniques concerning the field of web designing.       Requirements       B.E. in Computer Science or Information Technology. BS/MS in Human-Computer Interaction or Visual Arts.         Proven +2 years of work experience as a Web Designer, Visual Designer or relevant work.         A strong web designing portfolio would be preferred.         Highly proficient in Photoshop, HTML, CSS, and PHP.         Knowledge of Agile/Scrum development.         Ability to follow best practices and international coding standards.         Ability to work with various content management systems.         Strong interpersonal and communication skills.         Ability to work from home whenever required.         High degree of accuracy.         Good time management skills and ability to meet the deadline.         A keen eye on details.

column2: We are looking for a web designer to join our team. You will be involved in the development of our website, from the earliest conception to final release.      As our web designer, you will work with the front-end developer to create intuitive, attractive user interfaces to engage customers. Your duties will include taking requirements, creating mock-ups, and designing layouts while balancing the usability, visual appeal, and technical feasibility of the designs. You will also have the opportunity to plan and execute projects, as well as improve the overall quality of the website. column2: The mid-level UX designer will be responsible for creating engaging and intuitive user interfaces.                  The role requires a deep understanding of UX best practices and a passion for understanding user behaviors and needs through research, testing, and feedback.                             Key Responsibilities                     User Research: Conduct user research to gather insights into user needs and behaviors. Synthesize research findings into actionable deliverables like personas, journey maps, and user stories.                 Design Execution: Design and deliver wireframes, user stories, user journeys, and mockups optimized for a wide range of devices and interfaces.                 Prototyping and Testing: Create prototypes at various levels of fidelity to test and iterate on user interfaces. Conduct usability testing and incorporate user feedback to refine designs.                 Collaboration: Work closely with UX researchers, product managers, and developers to implement designs that accurately reflect the intended user experience.                 Design Systems: Contribute to the maintenance of a design system to ensure consistency across all products and platforms.                 Accessibility: Ensure that all designs meet accessibility standards to accommodate users with disabilities.                 Metrics and Feedback: Analyze user feedback and activity, and iterate to enhance the user experience.                 Mentorship: Provide guidance and mentorship to junior UX designers and other team members.                     Skills and Qualifications                       Bachelors degree in Design, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.                 3+ years of experience in UX design.                 Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Adobe XD, Figma, and InVision.                 Strong understanding of user-centered design and testing methodologies.                 Excellent communication, presentation, and analytical skills.                 Experience with HTML/CSS and JavaScript is a plus.                 A portfolio that demonstrates both creative thinking and the delivery of effective and pleasing user experiences.
column11: Analytical skills, Computer science, User research, CSS, Javascript, Tool design, HTML, Adobe, Usability testing, Testing

column2: About this Opportunity: Millerknoll Global Creative Studio is looking for a Digital Production Designer (Bangalore) to join our team. The Digital Production Designer (Bangalore) will work to provide best-in-class designs using established style guides to bring the MillerKnoll retail brands to life. You will work across brands and various channels to aiding in the production of e[1]commerce site updates, relaunches, email campaigns, organic social, paid digital ads, and international versioning. Our ideal candidate enjoys working in a highly collaborative environment and must have an unrelenting positive spirit and "can-do" attitude. This role Matrix reports to the Director, Global Creative Studio Retail (US based), and Team Lead / IT Manger (India). Essential Functions:  Staging and scheduling approved content on site CMS (Salesforce Commerce Cloud)  Staging email content on ESP platform (Zeta), linking, testing  Intake of final design projects from designers and exporting assets for distribution to various teams  Support Creative Studio team in Figma on promotional/non-promotional campaign design as needed; Mocking, routing, staging select landing pages or digital ads for various sales and campaigns  Performing unit testing and QA of websites in staging environment and post campaign launch  Maintain and suggest refinements to production workflows and processes across brands  Responsible for working with designers and ecommerce team to update all web site images with new imagery as directed.  Aid in upcoming website relaunches; Design using provided templates, flagging images for upload, staging approved designs and reporting on completion status  Aid Digital Asset Management team by uploading and tagging images on DAM library as needed  Aiding ecommerce team on website change requests for promotions, image swaps, or copy changes  Auditing for errors and fixing issues identified by design teams, Ecommerce team, Email Marketing team  Submitting improvement tickets and working with digital UX/UI team on changes to templates in Figma or on CMS  Preparing images in Photoshop as needed- cropping, scaling, ordering, optimizing, naming etc. Resizing and retouching where necessary Ideal Candidate  Bachelor?? degree or equivalent experience working in web or related field.  2-3 years of experience in the essential functions listed above.  Excellent written, verbal, and interpersonal communication skills.  Excellent understanding of Photoshop and basic image editing principles. Color correction a plus.  Strong organizational skills, ability to manage a large amount of assets internally and on CMS.  Strong attention to detail with an eye for good design that is on brand.  Active engagement with current web standards, tech, trends, formats, and styles.  Familiarity with HTML/CSS and basic coding skills.  Familiarity with digital asset bank tool like Bynder and any CMS tools like AEM, Salesforce, etc.  Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects, with excellent time management skills.  Ability to take direction, constructive criticism and to work within specified deadlines.  Adhere to process and procedures defined for the role, the team, and the organization.   Previous experience within a retail sale driven environment a plus.  Flexible hours to overlap with Eastern Time Zone.  Ability to work effectively with a variety of internal and external business partners Reporting structure  Locally reporting to Team lead and IT manager in India  Matrix reporting to WTL (Director, Global Creative Studio??etail) in US MillerKnoll is an equal opportunity employer.

column2: What are we looking for         The UX Designer will create user-centric strategies for e-commerce websites and execute them through interfaces that are beautiful and functional at the same time. They will work closely with an existing team of high performing UX Designers and User Researchers to create and optimize the shopping experience for our clients websites.      As a UX Designer, you will be hands-on in all aspects of User Experience design and development, including gathering and understanding business user needs, devising user flows, building out detailed annotated wireframes, high/low fidelity prototypes, and a wide range of strategic UX deliverables.       Day to day responsibilities       Reasonable accommodations will be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions of this position. The below list represents the major tasks assigned to incumbents in this job. They are not intended to be an exhaustive list of all tasks.        Creation of useable and accessible UI designs     Deliver design with attention to detail and well-organized files     Studies user behaviour and the competitive landscape to determine potential opportunities to improve conversion rates     Integrate quantitative and qualitative data into design solutions     Effectively communicate with client and the project teams     Learn how to read key metrics and KPIs in order to provide designs that address business problems     Collaborating with User Researchers in continuous website experiments by prototyping and testing UX improvements                        Ideal qualifications                       4-7 years of experience; strong performer with a track record of success     Portfolio of UI/UX design projects     Ability to wireframe, prototype and execute digital interfaces      Familiarity with UI/UX design software such as Sketch, Figma and InVision     A strong grasp of components of Visual Design: Typography, Composition, Space Form, Colours, etc     A working knowledge of UX practices like information architecture, user-flows, usability studies, user personas, etc     Proven background of working closely with clients - you should be comfortable presenting to clients and delivering on time      Strong desire to learn and grow in an e-commerce agency environment.     Demonstrated an ability to translate customer needs into technical aspects     Ability to communicate with both technical and non-technical team members.     Critical-thinker and problem-solver

column2: To fit the role, you will have had at least 3- 4 years experience in a web design / web development agency environment, specifically successfully selling websites and other digital marketing services.     You need an excellent understanding of website production, from a content, design, technology and marketing perspective.      A good understanding of SEO and the benefits to clients businesses is invaluable.      You must also understand sales and closing techniques, however, we can always provide refresher sales training for the right candidate.         We're looking for these qualities:         Well- organised - your day isnt scheduled by your manager - you should be comfortable managing your own workload, prioritising urgent tasks, meeting deadlines for responses.     Digitally smart - the success of the job comes down to knowing how to present web solutions to clients in a positive and convincing manner.     Great communication - theres a lot of talking, writing and some presenting. You should feel confident doing these things, and look and sound presentable.     Patience and care - decision making by clients can take weeks and it can take months. Considerate management of the sales cycle wins business every time. column2: We're seeking an experienced Senior UI/UX Designer who excels in turning concepts into user-centric web SaaS applications with a track record of taking projects from ideation to completion      Senior UI/ UX designers are responsible for creating high-quality user interfaces for digital products      They work with product managers, engineers, and other designers to create interfaces that are easy to use and look good on both desktop and mobile devices      UX UI designers often work with user research to develop prototypes that can be tested with real users          Roles and Responsibilities:      Lead UI/UX design projects for our SaaS products from concept to launch.          Develop user stories, personas, and storyboards to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas.          Craft wireframes, mockups, and prototypes to propose and iterate on design solutions.          Conduct user research and testing to refine and validate designs.          Must have led Large and complex projects.      Key skills & Desired Experience required for the role:      5+ years of professional UI/UX design experience for web SaaS applications, with a portfolio showcasing end-to-end design projects.          Mastery of design tools (e.g., Sketch, Figma, Adobe XD) and a good grasp of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.          Demonstrable experience in creating designs from the ground up and iterating through a customer-centered design process.          Excellent problem-solving skills and innovation in design strategies.          Proven ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.          Strong communication skills to articulate design decisions and workflows.      Employee Benefits: The company offers a range of employee benefits including:      Cashless medical insurance for employees, spouse, and children          Accidental insurance coverage          Life insurance coverage          Company-paid lunch          Company-paid transportation          Access to online learning platforms such as Udemy and LinkedIn Learning          Retirement benefits including Provident Fund (PF) and Gratuity          Sodexo benefits for income tax savings          Paternity & Maternity Leave Benefit          National Pension Saving

column2: Required Qualification/  Skills Sets Academically qualified in Interaction Design,  HCI or related design field Minimum of 5  years experience in user experience design or application interface development A Black-Belt in Adobe Creative Suite,  Illustrator,  In-Design,  and also be capable in HTML and CSS,  and full knowledge of their capabilities and limitations.  Up-to-date with latest developments in User Interface design best practices Expertise in commonly used User Experience patterns,  methodologies concepts,  practices,  and procedures Experience designing useful,  usable,  accessible,  branded and visually appealing user interfaces Being involved in User Centric design methodologies across large projects Comfortable working in a Mac environment Excellent communication skills Very keen attention to detail and quality is a must The ability to work autonomously and collaboratively to bring projects to completion Have keen interests to research & learn new,  or re-emerging front-end technologies [capabilities] that facilitate improved user experience. Design deliverables expected for each project which will include user needs analysis,  interaction requirements,  data models,  task flows,  wire frames,  prototypes,  screen schematics,  icons and interface elements,  style guide and any other project documentation as required Design and evolve task flows,  prototypes and designs to meet changing user needs Effectively translate usability findings into recommendations and designs Ensure that the design gets implemented as per the expectations set by the design images approved by the client and also would be responsible for ensuring the quality of the same Create detailed specifications and design guidelines that can be transmitted to development teams with zero information loss Document user interface guidelines and interact with application engineers to emphasize the importance of usability principles Experience designing to corporate/ industry style guides and company branding

column2: Job Title: Web Designer/  Senior Web Designer   Job Location: Gurgaon,  Haryana,  India     Who are we    Kolabro Business Solutions is a product startup based out of Sushant Lok,  Gurgaon.  We are building a B2B mobile app and other stack of products to help property brokers,  brokerage firms & developers to do their business more efficiently.  It is a platform where brokers will be able to manage leads,  their agents,  CRM and communicate seamlessly with the community using the Kolabro App.  Kolabro founding team consists of members from leading a digital media house & an Ex-Googler with over 15 years of combined experience in digital marketing at leadership positions.  At Kolabro,  we want to organize & support the Real Estate sector in India using technology.  A mammoth task equaled only by our zeal to work towards the goal.     Responsibilites:    A web designer would be responsible for creating innovative,  high visual impact designs for Kolabro and its clients.  It would be prudent to gather client requirements in detail and then create innovative design to delight the clients.  The design creation would be needed for an array of products and services such as Facebook Page images,  website designing,  posters,  brochures,  e-mailers,  etc.  Creative thinking,  good grasp of language,  designing nuances and attention to detail are few of the core traits of the Web Designer we are looking to hire.     Typical Work Activities:    1.  Create high quality designs for websites,  which are responsive and mobile ready 2.  Coordinate with client and work on feedback to provide a delightful experience 3.  Create sites,  banners,  posters,  and email templates as per requirements 4.  Constantly improve and implement changes to the product portfolio    Skill Set:    1.  Strong domain knowledge of HTML5,  CSS3 and ability to work in Bootstrap and other frameworks 2.  Strong creative skills with an eye for color,  composition,  layouts and attention to detail 3.  Expertize in Adobe Suite and other design software 4.  1 year of experience in design with an agency or a product

column2: As a Senior UI/UX Visual Designer with unique problem-solving and a deep passion for quality, you have the talent to help us design the next generation of FitFyles and bring our five-star Web and Mobile Apps to tens of millions of users each month. If this sounds like you, please read on!   Who You Are     You believe the experience is everything     You know how to use a strong process to create the best for people     You possess a relentless desire to innovate     You pay an unwavering attention to detail     You don?t think good enough is ever enough     You think art and beauty are completely compatible with a great sense of humor     You like having your hands in every aspect of a product?s design     You breathe simplicity and intuition into the design of everything you touch     You adore developers and like holding their hands     You?re a crack amateur psychologist     You surprise and delight with your designs     You could spend all day in SFMOMA, the California Academy of Sciences, or exploring street art     You know how to use em dashes appropriately     You know that crafting error messages and designing edge cases represents how much you really care     You use your dream state to help flesh out your product?s stories     Your right brains and left brains are equally developed   What You Want From Your Next Career Move To help people live longer, healthier, and happier lives, bringing simplicity and clarity to health information and connections, and encouraging healthy engagement through compelling design.    Why We Need You FitFyles is out to change the world?one person at a time. As a Visual Designer at FitFyles, your designs will be seen by and make a difference in the lives of millions of people. They?ll even help save lives. You?ll bring simplicity and clarity to health information and connections, and encourage health engagement through compelling design. You?ll work closely with Engineers and Product Managers to create designs that are simple but engaging and simple for the user, focusing on creating intuitive interactions and compelling, pleasing visual designs. Responsibilities include:     Define and build the revolutionary applications that actually help save lives     Bring simplicity, clarity, and ease of use to health ? a field filled with complexity, confusion, and uncertainty     Design novel visual interfaces, user flows, and compelling interactions, and develop, communicate, and implement the best-in-class user experience and associated UI framework on a range of products     Develop, communicate, and implement the best-in-class user experience and associated UI framework on a range of products     Advocate responsibly and effectively for users in a fast-paced startup environment, imparting day-to-day design leadership that fosters a shared understanding of the user-centric intersection between design, content, business, and engineering     Manage UX research and testing processes to drive the development and communication of design guidelines, patterns, and libraries that will be used to make a difference, and track and analyze metrics to inform design/UX optimization efforts     Oversee close coordination with the product management team to develop a shared vision of exceptional user flows, wireframes, prototypes, and final graphics   How You?ll invert the Healthcare Model To help people live better, healthier, and happier lives, bringing simplicity and clarity to health information history and encouraging healthy engagement through compelling design.    What You?ve Achieved     BA/BS or graduate degree from a top school or program, with an exceptional academic record (design or related degree preferred)     Professional background as an interactive / UX designer in mass-market web and mobile products     Strong user experience skill set including strategy, information architecture, design aesthetic, and usability testing     A compelling and engaging portfolio that demonstrates out-of-the box thinking, clean design principles, and exceptional user flows and experiences     Proven understanding of interaction design concepts and a unique sense of design principles     Expert skill level in Photoshop and Illustrator     Mobile-first approaches into your daily workflow (preferred)     Intimate understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and Javascript (preferred)

column2: Web/ UI Designer | Accugile Technologies Web/ UI Designer +1 650- 681- 0101 (US)  +91 994- 379- 8451 (IN)  About the role Accugile is looking for a dynamic User Interface/ Web Designer to join our team. You will work for a highly profitable,  focused and productive team,  turning conceptual designs into stunning,  functional layouts. You will collaborate with product management and engineering to define and implement innovative solutions for the product direction,  visuals and experience.  This includes executing all visual design stages from concept to final hand- off. You also will be able to create wireframes,  storyboards,  user flows,  process flows and site maps to communicate interaction and design ideas. You will advocate and defend designs and key deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders,  as as conduct user research and evaluate user feedback.  Skills and Experience   2- 5 years of UI/ UX experience  Daily management of visual updates to company websites,  company store pages,  email marketing campaigns and other digital resources,  including coordination of content creation,  change requests and various digital campaigns  Translate concepts into wireframes and UI mock- ups that lead to intuitive user experiences.  Facilitate clients product visions by researching,  conceiving,  wireframing,  sketching,  prototyping,  and mocking up user experiences for digital products.  Maintain brand continuity across all projects and platforms  Extensive hands- on experience in HTML,  CSS,  Javascript,  JQuery and other front- end markup languages.  Proficiency in Photoshop,  Illustrator or other visual design and wire- framing tools  Develop detailed graphic user interface templates and style guides  Practical Experience in creating visually appealing user interface designs,  web site designs and converting them to quality HTML including responsive design.  Portfolio must exhibit understanding of user experience design principles and knowledge of UI best practices and usability  Nice To Have   Front- end frameworks such as Bootstrap  Admin experience with WordPress and Magento  Knowledge of Axure,  Exact Target and Sales Force Marketing Cloud  Qualities and Characteristics   You are a creative thinker,  who is passionate about creating hand- crafted,  clean responsive web design and layouts.  You have mad design skills. You know your way around high- level product requirements and can transform them into an interactive masterpiece.  Organized,  with excellent communication skills  Working well with others in a team environment  Must be able to handle tight deadlines and manage multiple projects at any given time.  Remain current on industry changes,  and keep us at the forefront of technological trends (Material Design,  Continuous Integration)  Collaborate in daily meetings,  set priorities,  and partner with mobile development teams  Be self- motivated,  ego- free and can assist others in getting the most out of their career and their role at Accugile  General awesomeness  At Accugile,  no one works in a box. We nurture and leverage individual talents and encourage our web developers and designers to continually learn and grow. We offer creative freedom,  a collaborative and supportive (and fun!) work environment,  and an infinite variety of challenging assignments. Each one of our gifted developers and designers contributes unique experience and a fresh perspective to help fulfill our clients needs.  You will work within a team environment that is focused on collaboration to stay on target with strategy and quality standards. If this feels like the role for you,  we want to hear from you. Please be sure to include samples of your work along with your resume. column2: A web designer is responsible for creating a unique and user-friendly website that is perfectly adapted to a business s branding and specifications     They make certain that the website for a business is functional and up-to-date     Web designers also check that the plugins a company or business uses work with the store template they create     They ensure that the website is search engine friendly and optimized             Responsibilities of a Web Designer   :       Create a unique and user-friendly website that is adapted to business branding and specifications         Make sure the website is functionally and up-to-date         Create a store template that works with business plugins         Ensure the website is search engine friendly and optimized         Integrate various components of a business with their Shopify store         Connect the store with a business s social media platforms         Make any coding changes that are necessary       Program the website according to each business s needs       Optimize the store for maximum performance and functionality         Test and monitor the performance of a store on a regular basis         Skills of a Web Designer         A Web designer is proficiently skilled at building, launching, and maintaining stores and has expert knowledge of Shopify s admin system.     They also have a deep understanding of eCommerce design elements and understand the technical capabilities and limitations that Shopify has to offer.     They are proficient in CSS and HTML and have strong coding and programming skills. They also have knowledge of open-source software and common web technologies that are integral to building a multi-channel store experience.     A Web designer also knows SEO and how to work with the platform APIs. They also understand Shopify s theme development and liquid templating and have experience working with 3rd party Shopify apps. They are also skilled at testing and debugging.     A good Web designer has the ability to communicate well and works well with others. They are also highly organized, creative, and adaptable. Skills of a Web Designer     Ability to build, launch and maintain E-commerce storesExpert knowledge of Shopify s admin system     Deep understanding of eCommerce design elementsUnderstanding Shopify s technical capabilities and limitationsProficient in CSS and HTMLStrong coding and programming skills     Knowledge of open-source software     Knowledge of common web technologiesStrong SEO knowledge     Deep understanding of platform APIsKnowledge of Shopify s theme development and liquid templatingExperience working with 3rd party Shopify apps     Testing and debugging     Ability to communicate well     Works well with others Organization Creativity Adaptability
